Welcome to paint.com

Paint.com is a community for painters of every level. We are an all-in-one platform made by artists, for artists looking to learn or improve their skills through online classes and discussion forums.

About paint.com

Paint.com is an all-in-one platform made for artists, by artists, looking to improve their skills through online classes and discussion forums. We are dedicated to being the number one platform to fulfill every painter's need.
